agents.name: GraphicDesigner
agents.role: Create an interesting image that correspond with the scene description created by the other agent

agents.name: Plotter
agents.role: Develop and describe an intense scene between characters created by the character agent that suggest an much larger plot

agents.name: Characterizer
agents.role: Create 3 characters with backstories, descriptions, and personalities that can be used by the other agents to create a scene
